suggest.league/flysystem-async-aws-s3: If you want to communicate with AWS S3 asynchronously
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: If you want to communicate with AWS S3 synchronously
suggest.league/flysystem-ftp: If you want to communicate with the FTP protocol
suggest.league/flysystem-google-cloud-storage: If you want to communicate with Google Cloud Storage
suggest.league/flysystem-memory: If you want to communicate with in memory data
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp: If you want to communicate with the SFTP protocol
